name: @pfms/api-gateway
description: Kong API Gateway configuration and management

scripts.validate:dev: node scripts/merge-config.js dev && deck validate --config configs/dev/kong.yaml
scripts.validate:staging: node scripts/merge-config.js staging && deck validate --config configs/staging/kong.yaml
scripts.validate:prod: node scripts/merge-config.js prod && deck validate --config configs/prod/kong.yaml
scripts.sync:dev: node scripts/substitute-env.js dev && deck sync --config configs/dev/kong.yaml
scripts.sync:staging: node scripts/substitute-env.js staging && deck sync --config configs/staging/kong.yaml
scripts.sync:prod: node scripts/substitute-env.js prod && deck sync --config configs/prod/kong.yaml
scripts.diff:dev: node scripts/substitute-env.js dev && deck diff --config configs/dev/kong.yaml
scripts.diff:staging: node scripts/substitute-env.js staging && deck diff --config configs/staging/kong.yaml
scripts.diff:prod: node scripts/substitute-env.js prod && deck diff --config configs/prod/kong.yaml

notes.deck-cli: Deck CLI must be installed globally. See README for installation instructions.
